query:
SELECT 
              SUM(balance_credit) as "total_credits: _",
              Sum(balance_debit) as "total_debits: _",
              max(effective_height) as "max_height: _",
              strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', max(effective_date))  as "max_date: _"
            FROM balance_changes
            WHERE account_id = ?
